text: Suwon Samsung Bluewings () is a South Korean football club from Suwon. The team's mascot is "Agileon". There are three foreign players: Santos, Jonathan, and Castelin. "The wizard of left foot" Yum Ki Hun is Suwon's captain. ==Honours== ===Domestic=== ====League==== * K League 1 : Winners (4): 1998, 1999, 2004, 2008 : Runners-up (4): 1996, 2006, 2014, 2015 ====Cup==== * FA Cup : Winners (5): 2002, 2009, 2010, 2016, 2019 : Runners-up (3): 1996, 2006, 2011 * League Cup : Winners (6):1999, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2005, 2008 * Super Cup : Winners (3): 1999, 2000, 2005 ===Continental=== ====Major==== * AFC Champions League : Winners (2): 2001, 2002 * Asian Cup Winners Cup : Runners-up (1): 1998 * Asian Super Cup : Winners (2): 2001, 2002 ====Regional==== * A3 Champions Cup : Winners (1): 2005 ===Intercontinental=== * Pan-Pacific Championship :Winners (1): 2009 Category:South Korean football clubs Category:Samsung
title: Suwon Samsung Bluewings
